attributes.review: I don’t like this app. It doesn’t work. It’s trash, so is he. This app stole my house. I rode my pet fish to go home and then I go and the only thing I see is a door. If I could give this app zero stars I would but unfortunately I can’t.
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: This app will make your cat become a dog and it will wake you up from your sleep. It’s so bad that I have nightmares from this app coming to haunt me and rule this Earth!!! I am so scared right now and I hope that the App Store can remove this app.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: This app is horrible. First of all I wanted coffee because I wanted the whopper so then it gave me ice. I was trying to ignore it until my car drove my pet around the city. It’s awful. I would put zero star but it’s not possible.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I don’t know what this app did to my phone but the moment I downloaded it, everything went downhill. Smh, how can we trust this man for president if he can’t even make a simple app😓😓🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥵🥵🥵

attributes.review: I went to go walk my chinchilla and this app took my legs off I mean who does that! It also put my quesadilla in the freezer but my bra in the refrigerator are you serious this app is the worst I’ve ever had don’t get it!
attributes.title: Worst app ever
